item.description:
With so many choices and decisions to go to Red Bull, might be a good idea to meet.

I'll be at Bullocks for 6:00. Maybe we can have Matt pick up pizza's :-)

The choices are at the very least:

Do the Full MG trip with bus...
Do entrance pkg and fly there or get there on our own... Get our own transport to event and into town?

Do one day...
Do 2 days and an extra one in The City...

I'm sure there is more., Be nice to figure this out as a group... This will be a very rare event... Like the stuff FPA puts on :-)

RSVP so Matt can get the pizza right

CV

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: "Who's going to Red Bull" information meeting.
